long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Word Marker," allows users to easily highlight and mark words on web pages with customizable colors. Users can add multiple word entries, apply regex patterns, and manage their highlights with a simple interface. The extension includes intuitive controls for adding, marking, and clearing word highlights, ensuring a seamless and efficient browsing experience.
